response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable and worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering its immense value and significance, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that such a remarkable item finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates it as much as we do. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 950000}
